column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////In the six years we have been in operation
column2: I have never heard of anything remotely similar to this
column3: and as one of the two male managers who work at JINYA-Midtown
column4: I can say with impunity that neither of us would EVER say anything remotely comparable to what you have described. Thank you in advance for your follow-up. Here is my phone number
column5: as well: (917-748-8730). I await your response.
